main event: Multiple UFO sightings were reported on 30 April 1964 in San Jose, California, involving bright glares and shapes in the sky.
interesting points: Observers reported three distinct sightings of unidentified objects, including an egg-shaped object approximately 30 feet across and a star-shaped object larger than an automobile., The first sighting involved a bright glare just above a mountain range observed for 1 hour., The second sighting lasted for 2.5 hours, with the star-shaped object reported to be extremely bright., The third sighting indicated very bright glare movement to the north, observed for 2 hours., Observers were identified as reliable local individuals with prior knowledge of the area.
witness description: locals, including a sheet metal fabrication operator and a student who seemed reliable
